body:
@byronyi, If I am looking at the correct place, I didn't find any memory pinning done inside [`ibv_cmd_reg_mr()`](https://github.com/linux-rdma/rdma-core/blob/master/libibverbs/cmd.c#L358).

Also, looking at the manual of [ibv_reg_mr](https://linux.die.net/man/3/ibv_reg_mr), it doesn't mention memory pinning. It would be nice if they can mention whether they pin the memory in the manual.
